column2: Commercial Property for Rent - Jana Jaya City Rajagiriya
column6: JANA JAYA CITY - RAJAGIRIYARajagiriya lies between the administrative capital of Kotte and the commercial capital of Colombo city. To the east is Borella (Colombo and to the west is the main administrative hub of Sethsiripaya) The main Parliament Road that connects the city to the government offices and Parliament area is the main route in and out of Rajagiriya. Local economy and infrastructureThe Parliament road which connects the administrative capital and the commercial capital is regarded as the VVIP roadway in Sri Lanka and enjoys a high level of maintenance throughout the year due to its frequent use by senior parliamentarians and foreign dignitaries. The connecting bridge on this stretch was recently up-graded and the area is a recreation hub of wet-land parks, jogging tracks and park benches. The Diyawannawa River is also a seaplane port that connects domestic aircrafts covering many parts of the island.In terms of schools, Kotte hosts the island’s leading International School – Overseas International School. This school is popular amongst the diplomats and senior foreign consultants and country directors who work in Sri Lanka. Whilst transport to and from this school can take up to one hour from Colombo during the school traffic peak times, this school is within easy reach of Rajagiriya. During our research, we have found several foreign consultants moving out of luxury apartments in Colombo and moving into Kotte in order to be close to the school. OutlookIn conclusion, we can note that Rajagiriya in particular and Kotte in general offer residents a much more ‘homely’ atmosphere as compared to Colombo where the market is saturated and there are issues of heavy traffic congestion. The apartments in this area are popular amongst families with children, and senior citizens, both expatriates and locals. It’s also an extremely green environment that has public walk-ways, water sports and markets.DESCRIPTION OF JANAJAYA CITY, 11th FLOOR– RECOMMENDED SITE TO ESTABLISH A RESTAURANTTotal floor area		:	6520 Sq.Ff. (Including both side terrace area)Restaurant area			4993 Sq.ft.Swimming pool		:	70ft x 20ftPool deck		:	56.4ft x 9.9ftParking for 8 vehicles in the reserved area for parking (in the night there are enough of parking space available along the road)Separate elevator has fixed only to go to rooftopInterior has not done but pipe fittings has done according to restaurant concept.Lease amount Rs.1.5 Million per month

column2: Commercial Property Available for Lease in Rajagiriya
column6: 2 floors in a 3 story commercial property are available for lease/rent in Rajagiriya.This office space is consists of;Ground floor with floor area: 2,232 sqft2nd floor with floor area: 2,824 sqftTotal floor area is 5,056 sqft without the staircase areaConference room, management rooms, separated working spaces, dining space available where all the area is fully partitioned with glass/boards which can be used for any commercial purpose.2 set of bathrooms available in ground floor and another set of bathrooms available in 2nd floor.Total space is fully airconditioned with separate A/C units for separate partitioned areas.5 dedicated parking slots available with separate parking area for about 20 motor bikes.Separate rooftop area of open space is available which can be converted to filing/storing space on request.Situated within walking distance from Rajagiriya junction. Can be accessed from both Nawala Road (100m) and Parliament Road (80m). Close proximity to all the banks, restaurants, supermarkets and many more.Rent is Rs. 100/- per sqftDeposit - 6 months refundable security deposit is required.Advance - 3 months advance payment which will be deducted monthly in equal amounts from the 1st 12 months rental.Negotiable only after inspections. Call to arrange an inspection and for more details.
